channel.title: A good free forum for webclients?
channel.description:
if this is the wrong section, move it.
what free web host service would u recommend? so i can create a webclient on it, cheers!!

item.title: A good free forum for webclients?
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

[quote=“warxscape, post:4, topic:527758”][quote author=Pk6uhave2 link=topic=646509.msg4347772#msg4347772 date=1376155642]
www.rswebclients.com, you can transfer your current server files to it. Or are you saying you practically want a free VPS? If that’s the case you won’t get one for free that allows RSPS’.
[/quote]

lol i mean webs like e.g webs.com <would it be able to handle my webclient?

and sk8, lol il need a web developer for that right?[/quote]

Yeah you can use webs.com for that. Just add some basic HTML coding and jar/sign your client then you’re done. Good luck.

Read full topic

Free Web Hosting

100% Free Web Hosting by 000webhost | Host Your Website For Free

Join more than 16 million existing users who already hosting their websites on our cloud-powered free web hosting platform. We offer free website hosting with PHP, MySQL, free website builder and absolutely no ads! 000webhost.com web hosting will...


Both are free, but you have to do EVERYTHING yourself. That includes databases, making the websites, uploading and configuring the forums. But at least you don’t look like you used some free shitty premade fourms.
